description: Detects a Mesh Agent service installation. Mesh Agent is used to remotely manage computers
name: Mesh Agent Service Installation
query: winlog.channel:System AND ((event.code:7045 AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager) AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*MeshAgent.exe* OR winlog.event_data.ServiceName:*Mesh\ Agent*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
